mapper.select: SELECT bm.menuid AS menuId, bm.`name` FROM base_menu bm, user_strategy us, (select ug.cread_by from user_group ug where ug.id=#{groupId}) pu where pu.cread_by =us.user_id and bm.menuid=us.menu_id and NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM group_strategy gs, user_group ug1 WHERE gs.menu_id = bm.menuid and ug1.id=gs.group_id AND ug1.id = #{groupId} )
select menuid as menuId,bm.`name` from group_strategy gs,base_menu bm where bm.menuid=gs.group_id and gs.group_id=#{groupId}
